de.unlixx.runpng.png.chunks

Class PngPalette

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.unlixx.runpng.png.chunks.PngPalette

  • public class PngPalette
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements the png palette chunk (PLTE) with some additions for greyscale.
    See Also:
    https://www.w3.org/TR/PNG/#11PLTE

      • PngPalette

        public PngPalette(int[] anARGB)
        Constructor for an ARGB palette.
        Parameters:
        anARGB - An int array containing ARGB values.

      • PngPalette

        PngPalette(int[] anARGB,
           boolean bPrebuiltGreyScale)
        Internal constructor for an ARGB palette.
        Parameters:
        anARGB - An int array containing ARGB values.
        bPrebuiltGreyScale - True, if this is a prebuilt greyscale.

    • Method Detail

      • prepareGreyscale

        static PngPalette prepareGreyscale(int nLen,
                                   int nIncr)
        Internal palette creator for greyscale.
        Parameters:
        nLen - The desired length of the palette.
        nIncr - The incremental steps.
        Returns:
        A PngPalette object.

      • get

        public int get(int nIdx)
        Gets an ARGB value by index.
        Parameters:
        nIdx - The index of the ARBG value.
        Returns:
        An int containing the ARGB value.

      • set

        public void set(int nIdx,
                int nARGB)
        Sets a new ARGB value for the given index.
        Parameters:
        nIdx - The index of the ARBG value.
        nARGB - An int containing the new ARGB value.

      • find

        public int find(int nARGB)
        Finds the index of a specific ARGB value. Or -1 if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        nARGB - An int containing the ARGB value.
        Returns:
        An int containing the index or -1 if it does not exist.

      • length

        public int length()
        Gets the number of palette entries.
        Returns:
        An int containing the number of palette entries.

      • getBytes

        public byte[] getBytes()
        Gets all palette entries splitted into their RGB components.
        Returns:
        A byte array with the RGB values of all palette entries.

      • sortByTransparency

        public static int[] sortByTransparency(int[] anARGBSrc)
        Gets an int array of the given source array, sorted by their transparency in ascending order.
        Parameters:
        anARGBSrc - An array of ARGB values.
        Returns:
        An array of ARGB values, sorted by their transparency in ascending order.

      • spawnTransparency

        public PngTransparency spawnTransparency()
        Spawns a PngTransparency object from this PngPalette object. The current ARGB array will be sorted by transparency in order to have the same transparency sequence. So this method should not be invoked when this palette is already in use.
        Returns:
        A PngTransparency object. Or null if there is no transparency found in this palette.

      • createPalette

        public static PngPalette createPalette(byte[] abSrc)
        Creates a PgnPalette from a given RGB byte array.
        Parameters:
        abSrc - An RGB byte array.
        Returns:
        A PngPalette object.

      • getGreyscale

        public static PngPalette getGreyscale(int nBitDepth)
        Gets a prebuilt greyscale palette for the given bit depth.
        Parameters:
        nBitDepth - An int containing the bit depth.
        Returns:
        A PngPalette object.
        Throws:
        Failure - In the case of wrong bit depth.

      • clone

        public PngPalette clone()
        Overrides:
        clone in class java.lang.Object
